short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your own custom color theme on Threads. Make your experience more colorful!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Threads More Fun and Colorful with this Easy-to-Use Chrome Extension!

★ Brighten Up Your Threads!
Love using Meta's new Threads platform? This Chrome extension makes it even better! It's super easy to use and adds some cool colors and fonts to your Threads page.

★ Cool Features:
🎨 Change Colors: Pick different colors to make your Threads page look awesome. You can choose soft colors or bright ones – whatever you like!
🌈 Pick Your Own Color: Want something special? Use the color picker to find the perfect shade.
🔤 Change font style: Select from a small variety of fonts, transforming Threads' look and readability.

★ Why You'll Love It:
😊 Super Easy: It's really easy to set up and use.
🦄 Be Unique: You get to make your Threads look the way you want.
🤗 Always Fun: It makes your time on Threads more enjoyable.
🙏 Totally Free: This cool tool doesn't cost anything!

★ This extension is featured in Best Chrome Extensions for Threads: https://comment-generator.com/blog/chrome-extensions-for-threads.html

★ Contact
If you want to report a bug or have a feature request, please do not hesitate to reach me directly at takkbbl4@gmail.com.

★ Disclaimer
Theme & Color Changer for Threads does not belong or is not related to the official Threads™ application / website in any ways. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently. Theme & Color Changer for Threads (browser extension) is a wrapper to the original Threads™ web application and makes it more fun and colorful. This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified by any third party. All third party logos and trademarks displayed on this Chrome plugin are properties of the third parties. Theme & Color Changer for Threads is distributed AS IS. For more info and terms of service, visit our web site: https://comment-generator.com
